why.title: Pipelines benefits
why.description: Pipelines accelerator enables developers, business analysts and data scientists to quickly derive insights from data, without having to worry about infrastructure and integration.

items.header: Integrated with any and all data
items.paragraph: Pipelines offers a rich ecosystem of connectors for a variety of legacy systems, relational databases, file systems, cloud services, object stores, NoSQL, EBCDIC, and more.
Pipelines allows portability across on-premises and public cloud environments
Pipelines has a visual interface for building data pipelines, code free transformations, and reusable pipeline blueprints.
Pipelines offers data quality libraries, metadata and lineage capture, audit logging.

left_column.paragraph: Built-in connectors to a variety of cloud and on-prem, modern and legacy systems; public APIs to build custom connectors
UI to build data pipelines using a point and click designer studio
UI to build data pipelines using a point and click designer studio

right_column.paragraph: Conditionals and pre/post processing actions; Alerting and Notifications; Error processing
Wide variety of built-in data transformation plugins; Interactive data transformation interface with feedback at each step.
Time and process based scheduling, monitoring via logs, metrics, dashboards and reporting

pipeline_plugins.title: Plugins
pipeline_plugins.description: Pipelines support a variety of plugins for connecting to cloud and onprem services as well as to perform data transformations.
